title: Tether Gold Accounts for More Than Half the Entire Gold-Backed Stablecoin Market as XAU₮ Surpasses $4 Billion in Value
content: Tether Gold (XAU₮), the world’s leading tokenized gold product, continues to strengthen its position at the center of the gold-backed stablecoin market as demand for real-world asset tokenization accelerates amid record gold prices and persistent macroeconomic uncertainty. title: Tether Expands Support for INHOPE’s Global Work to Combat Online Child Sexual Abuse Material
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital asset ecosystem, today announced an expansion of its collaboration with INHOPE, the International Association of Internet Hotlines, to support global efforts to stop the spread of child sexual abuse material, strengthen cross-border cooperation, and protect children online.
